segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman, completely absorbed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the flood around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are engaged in a risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could topple over backward any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before there's an injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of the wet floor and the unstable stool is terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just feels like everything is on the brink of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself clenching my fists just watching it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
